metadata.title: wildfly: No timeout for EAP management interface may lead to Denial of Service (DoS) (low)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: No description is available for this CVE. 
            STATEMENT: Red Hat rates this as a low impact since this requires high privileges to jeopardize the system. The management interface is normally internal/local only and not exposed externally.
            MITIGATION: Currently there is no available mitigation for this vulnerability. Please make sure to perform updates as they become available.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 is installed
wildfly-domain-http is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
